title: Which Program Type is Right for You?
content: Organizations can launch public and private bug bounty programs on the Cyberbay Platform. Public programs are available to our entire cybersecurity Bug hunters community. Private programs are invitation-only, based on the needs of your program.

features.title: Public Bug Bounty Programs
features.text: Public programs invite a larger pool of talent and diverse perspectives. Utilizing public programs is a highly cost-efficient way to scale your cybersecurity efforts.

features.title: Private Bug Bounty Programs
features.text: Private programs offer complete control over participation. Cyberbay connects you with qualified cybersecurity Hackers based on their expertise, allowing you to handpick members for your program.
